com.matthew0x40.yahtzee.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.matthew0x40.yahtzee.game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game1PlayerConsole

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This "Game" class provides an interface for the entire Yahtzee to abstract away most of the logic in order to focus on the user interface in classes that extend this class.
